meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested dhourra from his fields.
meanings.sent2: Dhourra is a staple food in many African countries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to bury dhourra instead of acorns.
meanings.sent4: The dhourra fields swayed in the wind like a golden sea.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked dhourra filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The plant that produces the grain.
meanings.sent1: In the distance, the dhourra plants stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: Farmers carefully tended to the dhourra crop.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome had a tiny dhourra plant as a hat.
meanings.sent4: The dhourra fields whispered secrets in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the dhourra plant was a sight to behold.
